Package com.company.businessLayer

Class Restaurant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.businessLayer.Restaurant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestaurantProcessing, Observable, java.io.Serializable
    public class Restaurant
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable, IRestaurantProcessing, java.io.Serializable
    Class used to represent a restaurant. The orderItemMap field is used to store orders alongside the corresponding products. The menuItems list represents all the available product within the restaurant menu. The observers list holds all the objects that need to be updated when certain changes occur within this class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
